assignment1

Class StateReduced

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment1.StateSimple
      • assignment1.StateReduced
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    State

    public class StateReduced
extends StateSimple
    This class implements a state space in which states are only encoded by the distance between prey and predator, and not by their coordinates. This greatly reduces the state space from 11^4 different states to only 11^2.
    Author:
    josago
